MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L20 postcode area of Bootle, affecting properties in Gloucester Road, Park Street and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:17pm on 23rd December 2020.
